data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent:
Fred: Do you want to do something with me on Saturday?
Dan: No, it's ____ only ____ I don't work. Every Saturday I ____ my ____ to ____ park, and ____ have ____ at ____ favorite ____. I'm ____ busy.
Fred: Oh, ok ____. Maybe we can do something on a different day.
data.partBlankContent:
Fred: Do you want to do something with me on Saturday?
Dan: No, it's t__ only d__ I don't work. Every Saturday I ta__ my d__ to t__ park, and th__ have lu___ at m_ favorite resta_____. I'm pre___ busy.
Fred: Oh, ok th__. Maybe we can do something on a different day.
data.fullContent: Fred: Do you want to do something with me on Saturday? Dan: No, it's the only day I don't work. Every Saturday I take my dog to the park, and then have lunch at my favorite restaurant. I'm pretty busy. Fred: Oh, ok then. Maybe we can do something on a different day.
data.answer: 弗雷德：星期六你想和我一起做些什么吗? 丹：不，这是我唯一不工作的一天。每个星期六我带我的狗去公园，然后在我最喜欢的餐厅吃午饭。我很忙。 弗雷德：哦，那好吧。也许我们可以改天再做些事。
